content: lavender is best known as ron s temporary crush and will go down in history as being a love-struck wimp but i think there s more to her story don t you this bookmark is a fast and easy knit with a heart pattern it is easy to identify as lavender-themed yet also is a great mother s day valentine s day easter or christmas gift it is easy to work and very quick - less than 2 hours to make it is a bit shorter than ginny s and hermione s bookmarks but still makes a lovely set with all three as with all my patterns i tried to keep this pattern as beginner-friendly as possible i used easy to understand abbreviations and included a glossary with definitions this is an excellent first lace project and very intuitive and yet interesting enough for experienced witches and wizards you ll need about 25-30 yards of fingering weight yarn and 3 5mm us 4 straight knitting needles after finishing this little beauty be sure to block it as the garter stitch has a tendency to flop behind the stockinette and blocking always improves lace this pattern is the fourth pattern in the magical bookmarks series - a collection of free bookmark knitting patterns inspired by the girls of harry potter #magicalbookmarks
